TopicTitle: Logitech Extreme 3D Pro joystick support for Mac OSX

Articles.Content:
hi Squad and all other mods and experts. im having problems connecting my Logitech Extreme 3D Pro joystick to KSP 1.0.4.861.

- - - Updated - - -

all of a sudden after a restart, it is working... sorry for the pre-emptive post here. something was not right though.
